Text:
Time will tell to some degree, but this seems like the REAL DEAL.

Sounds great, just listened to it on generic PC speakers, though. Tracks match the allmusic.com track listing for it. Thanks uploader and fellow seeders. Will keep this upped for a while. THANKS.
Great rip! Saw this available today for stream on her site and was surprised this was already posted. Thanks!!
Catch the review at Guardian.uk  Made me hope that I'd find it here.  Thanks, Susquatch!!

Very fast and safe download!

Merci! Love this album
